author: Reppy 07
comment: Love that it can go almost pitch black and only takes a short couple seconds to accomplish. Just sucks that it won't work with the dim mode. I assume this is a limitation from google. The few watch faces I have are way perfect but too bright at night. Was really hopeful for an app. I'll still be keeping this app.
title: Couldn't be more simple and precise.

author: John Skeoch
comment: On the LG Watch R it does a great job reducing the active brightness, however in dimmed mode the app appears to have no effect. This produces the odd situation that your dimmed mode can end up being brighter than your active.   A good app if you dont use always on

reply.author: Thomas van Tilburg
reply.content: Sadly this is an limitation from Google, only watchface makers will be able to add a more dimmed mode

title: Doesn't quite work as desired

author: Dom DiMaggio
comment: You just open the app and cha he your brightness via slider. That's all there is to it. No fuss. I also liked that it allows you to go below normal brightness, which is a plus for making sure your watch survives for longer periods of time.
title: Simple Yet Useful
